description: He is the youngest recipient of the prestigious Swedish literary prize. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Singapore’s got talent: Cikada Prize winner Theophilus Kwek scores international readers for poetry
title_page: Singapore’s got talent: Cikada Prize winner Theophilus Kwek scores international readers for poetry | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – At 29, poet Theophilus Kwek learnt that he had won the Cikada Prize, a prestigious Swedish literary prize for East Asian poets.
Kwek had set foot into the Nordic country only for a day trip, and his work had not been translated into Swedish.
